xmlText.p: MINNESOTA TWINS — Agreed to terms with RHP Matt Magill and OF Andy Wilkins on minor league contracts.
TORONTO BLUE JAYS — Agreed to terms with RHPs Rhiner Cruz and Al Alburquerque on minor league contracts.<
MIAMI MARLINS — Traded OF Christian Yelich to the Milwaukee Brewers for OF Lewis Brinson, INF Isan Diaz, OF Monte Harrison and RHP Jordan Yamamoto.

TRENTON THUNDER — Named Jay Bell manager, Tim Norton pitching coach, Ty Hawkins hitting coach, Luis Dorante bullpen coach, Raul Dominguez defensive coach, Jimmy Downam trainer and Anthony Velazquez strength coach.<
CHICAGO DOGS — Signed RHP Josh Goossen-Brown.
LONG ISLAND DUCKS — Signed SS Dan Lyons.<
SOUTHERN ILLINOIS MINERS — Signed SS Julian Russell.
WASHINGTON WILD THINGS — Signed LHP Mike Castellani.<
NBA — Fined Golden State Warriors F Kevin Durant $15,000 for public criticism of the officiating.
ATLANTA HAWKS — Assigned F Tyler Cavanaugh and G Isaiah Taylor to Erie (NBAGL).
LOS ANGELES LAKERS — Assigned Cs Thomas Bryant and Ivica Zubac to South Bay (NBAGL).
WASHINGTON REDSKINS — Re-signed LB Mason Foster.<
CALGARY FLAMES — Recalled F Ryan Lomberg from Stockton (AHL) and G Mason McDonald from Kansas City (ECHL) to Stockton. Assigned G Tyler Parsons from Stockton to Kansas City.
CAROLINA HURRICANES — Assigned D Haydn Fleury to Charlotte (AHL).
EDMONTON OILERS — Assigned G Nick Ellis from Bakersfield (AHL) to Wichita (ECHL).
LOS ANGELES KINGS — Assigned Fs Michael Amadio and Jonny Brodzinski, and D Paul LaDue to Ontario (AHL).
NASHVILLE PREDATORS — Assigned G Matt O'Connor from Milwaukee (AHL) to Manchester (ECHL).
NEW JERSEY DEVILS — Placed F Marcus Johansson on injured reserve. Recalled G Mackenzie Blackwood and F Kevin Rooney from Binghamton (AHL).
NEW YORK RANGERS — Assigned F Dan Catenacci to Hartford (AHL). Claimed F Cody McLeod off waivers from Nashville.<
BAKERSFIELD CONDORS — Recalled F Evan Polei from Wichita (ECHL).
ROCHESTER AMERICANS — Recalled F Justin Danforth from Cincinnati (ECHL).
STOCKTON HEAT — Recalled G Mason McDonald from Kansas City (ECHL).
TORONTO MARLIES — Assigned F Josh Winquist to Orlando (ECHL).
WILKES-BARRE/SCRANTON PENGUINS — Returned G Charles Williams on loan to Manchester (ECHL).<
ADIRONDACK THUNDER — Signed G Tomas Sholl.
BRAMPTON BEAST — Loaned D Matt Petgrave to Toronto (AHL). Signed D Mackenzie Braid.
GREENVILLE SWAMP RABBITS — Signed F Shawn Bates.
MANCHESTER MONARCHS — Loaned G Branden Komm to Springfield (AHL). Released G Joe Spagnoli.
WORCESTER RAILERS — Added G Rob Lemelin as emergency backup.<
USADA — Imposed a four-year sanction on American cyclist Jennifer Schrumm after testing positive for a prohibited substance.<
SKY BLUE FC — Named Joe Nemzer and Lubos Ancin assistant coaches.<
SACRAMENTO REPUBLIC — Agreed to terms with D Mitchell Taintor.<
ALABAMA — Named Karl Scott secondary coach and Josh Gattis wide receivers coach.
CHATTANOOGA — Named Davern Williams defensive line coach.
FORDHAM — Named Peter Banas assistant women's tennis coach and Gio Grassi assistant strength and conditioning coach.
MARYLAND — Promoted associate head volleyball coach Adam Hughes to head coach.
NEW MEXICO — Announced junior men's basketball F Carlton Bragg is transferring from Arizona State.
PENN STATE — Named Ja'Juan Seider running backs coach. Promoted defensive line coach Sean Spencer to associate head coach. Reassigned running backs coach David Corley to wide receivers coach.
SOUTHERN CAL — Fired men's basketball associate head coach Tony Bland.
WASHINGTON STATE — Announced women's basketball coach June Daugherty is taking an indefinite medical leave of absence. Promoted associate head coach Mike Daugherty to acting coach.
